avalancheActivity.comment:
The wind will be strong to storm force in the regions exposed to the foehn wind. Since Monday mostly small wind slabs formed in particular at high altitude. The wind slabs can be released in all aspects.
Gradual decrease in danger of moist and wet avalanches as the temperature drops. Only isolated avalanches are possible as the day progresses. In the event of solar radiation this applies in particular on rocky slopes.
avalancheActivity.highlights: The wind will transport the loosely bonded old snow.

snowpackStructure.comment:
The snowpack is favourably layered. This applies in particular at low and intermediate altitudes.
Outgoing longwave radiation during the night was reduced. The surface of the snowpack is frozen, but not to a significant depth.

At intermediate and high altitudes there is more snow than usual.

avalancheActivity.comment:
The weather will be mostly sunny.
As the temperature drops only isolated small and, in isolated cases, medium-sized loose snow avalanches are possible. In the event of solar radiation this applies in particular on rocky slopes.

The backcountry touring conditions in the morning, after a clear night, are mostly favourable. In steep terrain there is a danger of falling on the hard snow surface.
avalancheActivity.highlights: The backcountry touring conditions are mostly favourable.

snowpackStructure.comment:
The snowpack is favourably layered. This applies in particular at low and intermediate altitudes.
The surface of the snowpack has frozen to form a strong crust. The spring-like weather conditions gave rise to rapid settling of the snowpack in particular at low and intermediate altitudes.

In particular at intermediate and high altitudes there is still a very large amount of snow.

avalancheActivity.comment:
The weather will be mostly sunny.
As the temperature drops only isolated small and, in isolated cases, medium-sized loose snow avalanches are possible. In the event of solar radiation this applies in particular on rocky slopes.

The backcountry touring conditions in the morning, after a clear night, are mostly favourable. In steep terrain there is a danger of falling on the hard snow surface.
avalancheActivity.highlights: The snowpack will be in most cases favourable.

snowpackStructure.comment:
The snowpack is favourably layered. This applies in particular at low and intermediate altitudes.
The surface of the snowpack has frozen to form a strong crust. The spring-like weather conditions gave rise to significant settling of the snowpack.

In particular at intermediate and high altitudes there is still a very large amount of snow.
